mapper.select: SELECT d.id, d.oid, d.pid, p.title AS pname, d.qty, p.price, d.startdate, d.enddate, d.days, o.receiver, o.address, d.status FROM order_detail d JOIN product p ON p.id = d.pid JOIN ordered o ON o.id = d.oid WHERE 1=1 AND o.status != 'unpaid' ORDER BY d.id

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY pdate DESC, o.id DESC) NUM , o.* , a.phone FROM ordered o JOIN account a ON a.id = o.aid WHERE 1=1
AND o.status = #{status}
AND TO_DATE(#{ddate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN TO_DATE(o.ddate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND (TO_DATE(o.edate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1)
AND o.status != 'unpaid' ORDER BY o.id DESC ) WHERE NUM BETWEEN (#{pageStart}+1) AND (#{pageStart} + #{perPageNum} )

SELECT d.id, d.oid, d.pid, p.title AS pname, d.qty, p.price, d.startdate, d.enddate, d.days, o.receiver, o.address, d.status FROM order_detail d JOIN product p ON p.id = d.pid JOIN ordered o ON o.id = d.oid WHERE 1=1 AND o.status != 'unpaid' ORDER BY d.id
SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY bcnt) NUM, p.* FROM product p ORDER BY bcnt ) WHERE NUM BETWEEN 1 AND 5

SELECT NVL(sum(qty), 0) AS numOfProducts FROM order_detail WHERE 1=1 AND TO_DATE(#{month}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN TO_DATE(startdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND (TO_DATE(enddate, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND status != 'unpaid'

SELECT COUNT(id) "numOfOrders", NVL(sum(total), 0) "revenue" FROM ordered WHERE EXTRACT(year FROM TO_DATE(pdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) = EXTRACT(year FROM TO_DATE(#{month}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND EXTRACT(month FROM TO_DATE(pdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) = EXTRACT(month FROM TO_DATE(#{month}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND status != 'unpaid'
